name: Fog of War Upon Death's Door

levels.description: Consumes <@ba.vdown>{attack@value}</> HP per second and deals <@ba.vup>{attack@damage}</> True damage per second to enemies that have either attacked or been attacked by this unit. Attack Range <@ba.vup>+{ability_range_forward_extend}</>, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, and each attack restores <@ba.vup>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> HP and has a <@ba.vup>{attack@buff_prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.stun>stun</> targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds
